name: Erin Pielak
greetingText: I really wanted to wish you a happy birthday
wishText: Happy 35th birthday Im sorry im poor but i wanted to make this for you ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! 35 37 38 39 40 41 42 and then you will be as old as me
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
